# Mark

```````````````````````````````` example
==mark me
.
<p>==mark me</p>
````````````````````````````````

## normal mark

```````````````````````````````` example
==mark me==
.
<p><mark>mark me</mark></p>
````````````````````````````````

```````````````````````````````` example
foo ==mark me==
.
<p>foo <mark>mark me</mark></p>
````````````````````````````````

```````````````````````````````` example
==mark me==foo
.
<p><mark>mark me</mark>foo</p>
````````````````````````````````

```````````````````````````````` example
==mark me===
.
<p>==mark me===</p>
````````````````````````````````

## escape mark

```````````````````````````````` example
==mark me\===
.
<p><mark>mark me=</mark></p>
````````````````````````````````

```````````````````````````````` example
==mark \=\= me==
.
<p><mark>mark == me</mark></p>
````````````````````````````````

## mark link

```````````````````````````````` example
==mark [me==](/)
.
<p><mark>mark [me</mark>](/)</p>
````````````````````````````````

```````````````````````````````` example
==[hello](/)==
.
<p><mark><a href="/">hello</a></mark></p>
````````````````````````````````
